title: Dick Hickey: blacksmith
creator_credit: Lorne Batchelor, Dave Bennett and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The blacksmith shop as a place for home-spun philosophy, where the village old-timers gather around the smithy stove to listen as the blacksmith, personified by Dick Hickey, goes about his work and shares his reflections about old times and the blacksmith’s craft.
